metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm having a billing issue. My latest bill seems much higher than usual.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. Could you please provide your account number so I can look into this?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's 1234567890. I'm really frustrated; I've been a customer for years and this has never happened before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Let me pull up your account. Okay, I see your recent bill. It appears there were some overage charges due to increased data usage last month. Would you like me to go through the details?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Overage charges? I don't understand. I haven't changed my usage habits. What exactly caused this sudden spike?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am able to provide you with a summary of your data usage, showing the dates and amounts of data used, but the specific programs using the data are not something I can access. I can also offer a way to monitor your data usage going forward.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That's... not very helpful. So, you can't tell me *why* I was charged extra? This is pretty bad customer service, if you ask me. Can you at least tell me *how much* overage I incurred and how much it cost?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience. Yes, the overage was 15 GB, costing $30.00. We do have usage alerts you can set up to prevent this in the future. I can help you set those up if you'd like, and I can also credit $10 to your account this time, given the situation.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, a $10 credit is better than nothing. I'll take it. And yes, please help me set up those usage alerts. Thanks.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Great! The $10 credit has been applied. To set up alerts, I will just need you to select your desired thresholds. You will receive notifications once you approach those limits. Is there anything else I can help you with?
